column3: “I just harvested this strain, and let me tell you it is my favorite day time smoke. Very uplifting and easy going, it's perfect for a pick me up. Smells insane, very tropical and spicy, with some ammonia and citrus undertones. Tastes spicy.”

“Tried this strain for the first time the other day. Let me tell you how warm and comfortable I felt in 3 mins top. I got by usual warm vibration feeling almost instantly after smoking it, and that makes me happy. I highly recommend it :)”

“My favorite sativa so far. Felt focused, uplifted, energized, motivated; great daytime smoke. Strong head high. Maybe sliiiiiight visual effect in the way of everything being beautiful somehow. Wish it was available in Oregon PDX area consistently. Looks like Nirvana Seeds discontinued selling seeds of it too :(”
“Awesome, happy high and low on munchies!”

“If you're a Sativa lover, you have to give this a try. Those who are old enough to remember that Thai Stick that was around during the late 70's early 80's. well here it is. Full moon reminded me of just that. nice spicy, earthy,  slightly lemon. Creeper. Full Moon strain is a great daytime choice, but it does have the tendency to cause sleepiness during the come down phase. 
This starts in the head, then slowly to t...”

“I grew and harvested this strain and the high is crazy. Sometimes it's a clear headed high. Other times, it's spacey and surreal. Sometimes objects and structures star bending in weird ways. But the high itself has always been good. If your a fan of Sativas and psychedelics, this is a must try. <3 Has a crazy smell as well. Sweet and tropical as you would expect.”

“This strain was positively wavy. I smoked this strain, and I was sure that the bud was not getting me high, rather the blunt was. After 30 minutes, I began to hallucinate, impairing my driving vision significantly. The sunrays were bending, and I couldn't stop smiling. What an elite day time smoke! Stay lifted (:>)”

“Personally the best strain for myself I've ever experimented with. Gives me a clear minded head high, but i can also be relaxed when I don't have things to get
 done around the house.”
“Very uplifting and happy high”

“Everything, from the bud structure to the fragrant sweet floral smell with a strong herbal spiciness, yell pure sativa. But the effects are where it really reveals itself in its full glory - an intense, soaring head high born aloft by a sense of euphoria which wells up from deep within and contaminates your entire being with an infectious joyfulness. And the trippiness is there too - at times, the vast mental space o...”
“Cerebral high, perfect for full moons.”
“Very earthy, perfect combination for a wine an great conversations.”
“Very nice Sativa.  Light floral flavor via vaping.  We liked the relaxing head high, yet able to get things done.”
“Happy, uplifting.”

“It's called Moon Dance over here in Michigan. Well atleast from Primo in my area. This is amazing!!! I feel anyone should smoke this atleast once if they going to smoke. Feels amazing, and great to wake up to. Gives me the confidence I need.”
“One of my favorite strains 💚 And what a rad name 🌝”
“I suffer for depression and I have to tell you that is one of my favorite    top recommend it give this this nice relaxing feeling but with energy and uplifting ❤❤❤”
“This was a harsh one, needed to use a water bong to temper the roast. The high was typical sativa but felt a bit anxious from it.”
“Perfecto for working or partying. It gets you in the best mood. Zero 0 paranoia”
“Very fruity flavor very ennergetic high very good strain”
